channel.title: Fnatic- A professional remake of 2006 runescape || we're here for the players
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/oldschoolbanner_zps00a1de58.png[/img]
[B]Welcome to the fnatic thread. We have had a few servers but recently i decided to work on the remake i had released a few months ago which was quite a big hit and here it is! Every city is populated and we have a 95% dialogue rate of runescape in 2006.
I know most of you are going to reply to this thread stating that their are multiple remakes, i know. I try my best to keep mine seperate from the others, in fnatic we make a guarantee to put the players first 100% and we don't hire immature staff at all.
So please, come join this new but growing server and get your head start before the hiscores are released! See you ingame.[/B]
[B][I][U]Client features:[/U][/I][/B] Music Smaller cache ( Takes less than 8 seconds to download the jar and less than a minute to download the cache) 317 gameframe ( same as runescapes in 2006) You will see more from the media.
[size=18pt][u][b]Links:[/b][/u][/size]
[size=24pt]Play NOW:[/size] http://www.fnatic-os.com/webclient.html
[size=24pt]FORUM:[/size] http://www.fnatic-os.com
[size=24pt]Download Jar:[/size] https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/79835748/Project%20Fnatic%20OS%20CLIENT%20V1.jar
Videos ( more coming soon ): [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xSmeJauDWGE[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0MH3XTB7Ce0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[size=14pt][u][i][b]Server Features[/b][/i][/u][/size]
[B][U]Combat:[/U][/B] [color=green]*PvP fully complete *Perfect max hit formulas *Perfect accuracy formula *Equipment requirements[/COLOR]
[B][U]Magic:[/U][/B] [color=green]*Every modern combat spell *Can't mage through walls *Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working *Bones to bananas *Bones to Peache's *Weakening spells *bind, snare, entangle *Teleports, teleothers *Alching *Superheat *Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR]
[B][U]Prayer:[/U][/B] [color=green]*All bones bury-able *Every prayer working properly *Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
Mining: [color=green]*Emptying and refilling rocks *All ores can be mined *Correct pickaxe finding and animations *Prospecting *Random chance of obtaining gems *Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR]
Firemaking: [color=green]*All logs light able *Adding and depleting of lightened logs *Ashes appear after logs burn out *Correct animations *Clipped[/COLOR]
[B][U]Woodcutting[/U][/B] [color=green]*Stumps and regrowing trees *Correct hatchet finding *Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR]
Crafting: 100% *Cutting gems *Making amulets, necklaces, and rings *Stringing amulets *Tanning normal and hard leather *Crafting normal and hard leather.. *Spinning wool *Making pottery
[B][U]Cooking:[/U][/B] *All fish can be cooked *All meats can be cooked *Grinding wheat into flour *Cakes *Pies *Pizza *Stew *Wine *Correct burning formula *Lumbridge cooking range bonus *Eating food (in pieces) *Correct animation and timing used
[B][U]Rune crafting 100%:[/U][/B] [color=green]*Multiple rune crafting *All alters *Pouches *Talisman Locating[/COLOR]
[B][U]Quests:[/U][/B] [color=green]Cook's Assistant[/COLOR] Lost city
[img]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/pfos1_zps1fce5b5d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/compf_zps3d780448.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/rockcpf_zpsb1a782e3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1273.photobucket.com/albums/y416/lord-wape/snakesonaplaneLOL_zpse43dcf43.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/Shot59_zps555aadde.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/Shot64_zps1785beb5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/Shot62_zpsa01d283e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/Shot60_zps413d96d7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/Shot63_zps74712ac4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/barrowsworking_zps55b85e2b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/draynor_zps80548a74.jpg[/img]
